reqs:
Prereq: Admission to MRSc or GCR program; others require permission from the program office at info@mrsc.ubc.ca
This section will be blocked from registration unless there is sufficient enrolment. For MRSC and GCRS students only. For other students, permission is required. Please contact the program office at info@mrsc.ubc.ca.
courseName: Measurement for Assessment, Planning, and Evaluation
